title: Designing Teaching Methods to Assess and Foster Creativity in Science Classrooms

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Program focusing on creativity assessment tools and strategy development for fostering creativity in science classrooms, targeting pre-service elementary teachers and instructional designers

learning_goals: Learners can apply and analyze the 9 components of the Science Classroom Creativity Scale (SCC) in actual classroom settings.
Learners can specify cognitive and affective support strategies when designing lessons to foster creativity.
Through project-based assessment, learners can diagnose individual creativity development levels and propose personalized feedback plans.

resources: SCC (Student Course Completion) Assessment Scale Questionnaire
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
